module: Module-level comment: This module implements a Memory Controller Block (MCB) wrapper for DDR/DDR2/DDR3 SDRAM interfaces. It manages address/data operations, clock generation, and I/O functions for multiple ports. The module uses IODRP2 components for DQ/DQS signal management, implements various port configurations, and supports different memory types. It handles calibration, timing adjustments, and status reporting, providing a flexible interface between user logic and memory devices.
